TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataSourceProvider

summary.span: 定义经控件设计器实现后可访问数据源的接口。

span.span: Defines an interface that a control designer can implement to provide access to a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 能够提供数据源的类可以通过使用接口的对象实现此接口，以启用对其数据源的访问 。A class that is able to provide a data source can implement this interface to enable access to its data source by objects that use the interface. 此接口由 和 类使用。This interface is used by the and classes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个名为的自定义类 `TemplatedListDesigner` ，该类继承自 类并实现 `IDataSourceProvider` 接口。The following code example shows a custom class, named `TemplatedListDesigner`, which inherits from the class and implements the `IDataSourceProvider` interface. [!code-xml[System.Web.UI.Design_Samples1#1](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.design_samples1/Common/System.Web.UI.Design_Samples1.xml#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerable GetResolvedSelectedDataSource() cil managed

summary.span: 从所选的数据源中获取选定的数据成员。

span.span: Gets the selected data member from the selected data source.

returns.span: 从选择的数据源中选择的数据成员 -- 如果控件允许用户为数据源选择 （例如 ），并提供 属性来选择数据源内的特定列表（或 ）。

span.span: The selected data member from the selected data source, if the control allows the user to select an (such as a ) for the data source, and provides a property to select a particular list (or ) within the data source.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现了 `GetResolvedSelectedDataSource` 接口的和 方法 。The following code example implements the `GetResolvedSelectedDataSource` and methods of the interface. `GetSelectedDataSource`方法获取作为数据源的任意对象，而此方法的实现 `GetResolvedSelectedDataSource` 将该对象转换为 对象。The `GetSelectedDataSource` method gets an arbitrary object as the data source, and this implementation of the `GetResolvedSelectedDataSource` method converts that object into an object. [!code-xml[System.Web.UI.Design_Samples1#17](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.design_samples1/Common/System.Web.UI.Design_Samples1.xml#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetSelectedDataSource() cil managed

summary.span: 获取对数据源提供程序的选定数据源的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the selected data source from the data source provider.

returns.span: 此数据源提供程序的当前选定的数据源对象。

span.span: The currently selected data source object of this data source provider.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现了 `GetSelectedDataSource` 接口的和 方法 。The following code example implements both the `GetSelectedDataSource` and methods of the interface. `GetSelectedDataSource`方法用于确保设计时与该控件关联的数据源是实现接口的对象 。The `GetSelectedDataSource` method is used to ensure that the data source associated with the control at design time is an object that implements the interface. 这允许用户循环访问数据源。This allows users to iterate through the data source. [!code-xml[System.Web.UI.Design_Samples1#17](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.design_samples1/Common/System.Web.UI.Design_Samples1.xml#17)]
